title: Simple Garlic Pasta
description: A quick and easy pasta dish with garlic, olive oil, and parmesan. Perfect for demonstrating basic cooking techniques.

steps.instruction_text: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.
While water heats, peel and mince 4 cloves of garlic finely.
Grate the parmesan cheese and set aside in a bowl.
Add pasta to the boiling water and cook according to package directions, stirring occasionally.
In a large pan, heat olive oil over medium heat and saut√© the minced garlic for 1-2 minutes until fragrant but not browned.
Drain the pasta, reserving 1 cup of pasta water.
Toss the drained pasta with the garlic oil, adding pasta water as needed to create a silky sauce.
Remove from heat and fold in the grated parmesan until melted and creamy.
Plate immediately and garnish with fresh black pepper and extra parmesan.
